DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine Provigil® ( modafinil ) dose 200 mg daily safe effective treating symptom sleepiness fatigue associate Major Depressive Disorder add SSRI .
DOC.brief_title: Provigil Conjunction With SSRIs Treatment Mild Moderate Depression With Attendant Symptoms Sleepiness Fatigue .
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 100 male female outpatient , age 18 65 , enrol four site United States . This study consist two part . The first part consist 6 week open label treatment select SSRI & double blind treatment Provigil placebo ( inactive medication ) . After six week double blind treatment phase patient enter four week open label treatment phase Provigil . The dose Provigil exceed 400 mg less 100 mg per day . They continue take prescribe SSRI .
DOC.criteria: Major Depressive Disorder MADRS score ≥ 15 screen & baseline . Significant fatigue evidence FSS ≥4 screen & baseline . Excessive sleepiness evidence ESS ≥ 10 screen & baseline . Treatment refractory depression Serious unstable medical condition . Pregnancy Primary diagnosis another Axis I II disorder Alcohol substance abuse dependence within past 12 month .
